column4: Really happy with wubi so far.. there's no way I'm uninstalling windows or getting a new computer and all of the warnings about how dangerous partitioning is left lfew options
partioning is not more dangerous than crossing the street or driving a car ... it just helps when you know what you do :)
so you'll never going to learn how to drive a car because you heard on the news that there could be traffic accidents? ;-)
